issue.title: 🐛 fix: boolean fields in kafka producer monitor
issue.body:
⚠️⚠️⚠️ Since we do not accept all types of pull requests and do not want to waste your time. Please be sure that you have read pull request rules:
https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#can-i-create-a-pull-request-for-uptime-kuma

Tick the checkbox if you understand [x]:
- [x] I have read and understand the pull request rules.

# Description

Fix field types in database and converting it to boolean just like other boolean fields

newly added migrations should be okay since we where storing data in 0 and 1

Fixes https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/3760

## Type of change

Please delete any options that are not relevant.

- Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

## Checklist

- [x] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [x] I ran ESLint and other linters for modified files
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own code and tested it
- [x] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
  (including JSDoc for methods)
- [x] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] My code needed automated testing. I have added them (this is optional task)

## Screenshots (if any)

Please do not use any external image service. Instead, just paste in or drag and drop the image here, and it will be uploaded automatically.

comment.body: Look reasonable to me. I think you can drop the old columns after migrating the data?

issue.title: show daily "status" instead of every ping on status page
issue.body:
how can i show only the daily "status" of my service, instead of every single ping?

example:
![image](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/assets/83615960/cc57cc9e-728f-4d7b-9dc1-9be8c5730192)
instead of:
![image](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/assets/83615960/0e6f3580-5145-4424-b431-2d4195cda9d1)

comment.body:
Please see
- https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/2477
- https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/3404 / https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/1984 / https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/2756

=> Currently, what you wan't is not possible. Here is our contribution guide: https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/blob/9379498b49c8bd892d69ac1e177160d754592478/CONTRIBUTING.md

issue.title: Have the option to make the status page show all monitors in columns next to each other instead of scrolling.
issue.body:
### ⚠️ Please verify that this feature request has NOT been suggested before.

- [X] I checked and didn't find similar feature request

### 🏷️ Feature Request Type

UI Feature

### 🔖 Feature description

Would like to have the status page display the monitors in multiple columns in the browser instead of having to scroll up and down to view all the monitors. this would definably make uptimekuma a lot more usable for quick viewing/glancing.

### ✔️ Solution

Would like to have uptime kuma status page to give us an option to either disaply the status page in Lists or grid options with columns so all monitors can be displayed without having to scroll


### ❓ Alternatives

advise where i can edit the status page myself so I can rework the layout for my installation

### 📝 Additional Context

_No response_

comment.body:
As noted above (I don't see a functual difference, only design):

> If not, what makes this issue unique enough to require an additional issue? (Could this be integrated into the issue linked above?)

issue.title: Chore: Round ping value for real-browser monitor type
issue.body:
⚠️⚠️⚠️ Since we do not accept all types of pull requests and do not want to waste your time. Please be sure that you have read pull request rules:
https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#can-i-create-a-pull-request-for-uptime-kuma

Tick the checkbox if you understand [x]:
- [x] I have read and understand the pull request rules.

# Description

The real-browser monitor type should not report sub-milisecond ping value since it's not meaningful.

## Type of change

- User interface (UI)

## Checklist

- [x] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [x] I ran ESLint and other linters for modified files
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own code and tested it
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
  (including JSDoc for methods)
- [x] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] My code needed automated testing. I have added them (this is optional task)

## Screenshots (if any)

|before|after|
|------|-----|
|![image](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/assets/3271800/6dd9abf0-1d98-4eaa-a6cf-6f447a2f3767)|![image](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/assets/3271800/c752774d-30f3-4f87-968e-c799550a6187)

comment.body:
Thinking a rare special case, should it be rounded up to `1` if  `ping > 0 && ping < 1`? Because 0ms may be a bit misleading.

Just like file size display on Windows,  0.001KB is always rounded up to 1KB.

comment.body:
Bug fix can be in 1.23.X.

But since this pr is touching 2.0.0's code, I am afraid that it cannot be simply rebased into the 1.23.X branch automatically.

If you want this bug fix in 1.23.X, feel free to create a new pr which is based on this branch: 
https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/tree/1.23.X

issue.title: Monitor Kafka Producer Enable Kafka SSL disabled after checking box and saving
issue.body:
### ⚠️ Please verify that this bug has NOT been raised before.

- [X] I checked and didn't find similar issue

### 🛡️ Security Policy

- [X] I agree to have read this project [Security Policy](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/security/policy)

### Description

when adding a new monitor type for kafka producer, there is an option to enable kafka ssl,  when checking the box to enable kafka ssl when I click on save the check box is unchecked.

### 👟 Reproduction steps

add new monitor fill out following

friendly name
kafka brokers
kafka topic anme
kafka producer message
check enable kafka SSL
leave the Kafka SASL option to none

then save and the enable kafka SSL check box is unchecked

### 👀 Expected behavior

when checking the enable kafka ssl that the check box stays checked no matter what

### 😓 Actual Behavior

when checking the enable kafka ssl and saving the check box becomes unchecked after saving.

### 🐻 Uptime-Kuma Version

1.23.1

### 💻 Operating System and Arch

docker

### 🌐 Browser

MS Edge 110.1587.41

### 🐋 Docker Version

k8s 1.27

### 🟩 NodeJS Version

_No response_

### 📝 Relevant log output

_No response_

comment.body:
@louislam 
The problem was more than this, I was not fully familiar with the ORM that used in uptime kuma
